column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I've lived in New York
column4: and travelled extensively in the States and Europe visiting museums.  While NYC definitely has some great museums and Philly's PMA and NYC's MoMa/PS1 are up there among my favorite museums
column5: AIC definitely comes in first.  The Hermitage experience was ruined for me due to the overabundance of rude tourists
column6: and I have not been to the Louvre yet
column7: but I've otherwise been to a lot of museums in Europe.  Albertina in Vienna is a close second.
